plot: Tucker, a drug dealer who wishes to go straight, has a plan to turn his life around. His girlfriend, Cindi, is part of the plan to pack it up and call it quits. Yet her affair with another drug dealer puts out the lights on a bright plan.
title: The Universe and I
plot_es: Tucker, a drug dealer who wishes to go straight, has a plan to turn his life around. His girlfriend, Cindi, is part of the plan to pack it up and call it quits. Yet her affair with another drug dealer puts out the lights on a bright plan.
plot_en: Tucker, a drug dealer who wishes to go straight, has a plan to turn his life around. His girlfriend, Cindi, is part of the plan to pack it up and call it quits. Yet her affair with another drug dealer puts out the lights on a bright plan.
